name: clutchball (itch)
description:
Dodgeball deathmatch in a huge arena - anything's allowed. Throw balls at waves of opponents, unlock teammates to help you get further and reach the final boss!

Controls

  • WASD: move
  • Spacebar: jump
  • LMB: charge & throw balls
  • RMB: dodge

The game autosaves. To reset your save: press F10, then press R to restart the game.
